name: All Hail the Silence
description:
'''All Hail the Silence''' is an [[electronic music]] duo comprising American electronic musician [[BT (musician)|BT]] and English singer-songwriter [[Christian Burns]]. The band was informally announced on March 8, 2012, but live shows and project announcements did not commence until the second half of 2014.

All Hail the Silence and its album are notable in that they were created using analog synthesizers without the aid of a computer.
